5478.quoteText:
We’ll never sell your data you share with the Blender Market.
Period.
5478.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

5479.quoteText: Furthermore, the Owner may be obliged to retain Personal Data for a longer period whenever required to do so for the performance of a legal obligation or upon order of an authority.
5479.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

5480.quoteText: This Website does not support “Do Not Track” requests.
5480.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
